data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of Bothynus Hope from Argentina and Bolivia (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Dynastinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hardy, Martin (2017): Description of a new species of Bothynus Hope from Argentina and Bolivia (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Dynastinae). Zootaxa 4362 (1): 141-145, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4362.1.9
